name: Super Future Soldiers
description:
Super Future Soldiers is a fast paced action packed 2D multiplayer platformer shooter underlined with a nice synthwave soundtrack and plenty of action, weapons and epic moments! 

Features:
- Three Classes each with a prestige class
- Unlockable characters
- Online Multiplayer
- Online with bots or friends
- Offline vs bots
- Three game modes with each a map
- Internet connection required for multiplayer!
